title: Outcome-Based Language Education Design for Pre-Service Healthcare Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A program supporting pre-service teachers in applying OBE (Outcome-Based Education) principles when designing healthcare language education curricula, with continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can develop three measurable performance indicators suitable for a healthcare language education curriculum.
Learners can propose methods for integrating knowledge, skills, and attitudes (KSA) elements when designing courses under the OBE framework.
Learners can improve and revise course design drafts using formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
